name: The Mark of Control
description:
Use WASD to move around and the mouse to look.

Use TAB to lock and unlock the cursor.

The Mark of Control is a first person, open world, sand-box game where the player has the opportunity to have sex with any non-playable character. There are multiple ways to go from meeting to fucking including seduction, blackmail, and magic.

For more information, to keep up on the development, or to show your support for the project, check out our Patreon page.

After playing the game, please take a moment to give us feedback by filling out our gameplay survey.
